questions.question: What is the main goal of Web3 technology?

answers.A: To create a decentralized web that is controlled by a small group of individuals
answers.B: To create a decentralized web that is controlled by a large number of users
answers.C: To create a centralized web that is more secure
answers.D: To create a centralized web that is more efficient

answers.A: A contract that is legally binding in the physical world
answers.B: A contract that is legally binding in the digital world
answers.C: A contract that executes automatically based on predetermined conditions
answers.D: A contract that can only be accessed by a select group of people

questions.question: What is the main benefit of using a decentralized application (DApp) over a traditional application?

answers.A: DApps are faster
answers.B: DApps are more secure
answers.C: DApps can be accessed by anyone, anywhere in the world
answers.D: DApps are cheaper to develop

answers.A: A digital ledger that records transactions in chronological order
answers.B: A digital ledger that records transactions in reverse chronological order
answers.C: A digital ledger that records transactions randomly
answers.D: A digital ledger that records only certain types of transactions

answers.A: A physical coin that can be used for online transactions
answers.B: A digital currency that uses encryption techniques to secure transactions
answers.C: A digital currency that is backed by a government
answers.D: A digital currency that can only be used on a certain platform

answers.A: A non-financial token that can be traded on a blockchain
answers.B: A non-fungible token that represents ownership of a unique digital asset
answers.C: A non-fungible token that represents ownership of a physical asset
answers.D: A non-financial token that represents ownership of a company

questions.question: What is a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO)?

answers.A: An organization that is controlled by a single person
answers.B: An organization that is controlled by a group of people
answers.C: An organization that is controlled by a set of rules encoded on a blockchain
answers.D: An organization that is controlled by a government

answers.A: A browser that is used to access websites that use Web3 technology
answers.B: A browser that is used to access websites that use Web2 technology
answers.C: A browser that is used to access websites that use Web1 technology
answers.D: A browser that is used to access physical stores

answers.A: An exchange that is controlled by a central authority
answers.B: An exchange that is controlled by a decentralized network
answers.C: An exchange that is only accessible to a select group of people
answers.D: An exchange that only supports certain cryptocurrencies

answers.B: The software used to develop Web3 applications
answers.C: The protocols and standards used by Web3 technology
answers.D: The user interface of Web3 applications

questions.question: What is the main advantage of a decentralized storage network over traditional cloud storage solutions?

answers.A: Faster access times
answers.B: Higher capacity limits
answers.C: Lower costs
answers.D: Improved security

questions.question: What is the main function of a Web3 wallet?

answers.A: To store and manage cryptocurrency assets
answers.B: To manage website passwords
answers.C: To encrypt and secure personal data
answers.D: To access decentralized applications

answers.A: A unique identifier that is assigned by a centralized authority
answers.B: A unique identifier that is generated by a blockchain network
answers.C: A unique identifier that is used to track user behavior
answers.D: A unique identifier that is associated with a specific geographic location

questions.question: What is a decentralized finance (DeFi) application?

answers.A: An application that enables individuals to borrow and lend funds without the need for a central authority
answers.B: An application that enables individuals to purchase and sell goods and services using cryptocurrency
answers.C: An application that enables individuals to earn passive income by holding cryptocurrency assets
answers.D: An application that enables individuals to make charitable donations using cryptocurrency

answers.A: An access point that enables users to connect to the Web3 network
answers.B: A service that provides users with a personalized Web3 experience
answers.C: A platform that aggregates data from multiple Web3 sources
answers.D: A tool that enables developers to build Web3 applications

questions.question: What is a decentralized identity (DID) resolver?

answers.A: A tool that enables users to verify their identity on the Web3 network
answers.B: A platform that enables developers to build decentralized identity solutions
answers.C: A protocol that ensures the security of Web3 identity transactions
answers.D: A service that provides users with access to decentralized identity solutions

questions.question: What is a decentralized oracle network?

answers.A: A network that enables users to connect to the internet without the need for a central authority
answers.B: A network that provides accurate and reliable data to decentralized applications
answers.C: A network that enables users to access decentralized exchanges without the need for a central authority
answers.D: A network that provides security and encryption services to decentralized applications
